amendment.description: Amendment sought to reorder the priority of governments when funds are disbursed in a bankruptcy. Local governments would have been designated first followed by State government and then the Federal government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 as printed in House Report 105-573 to place repayment of money owed to a governmental unit as last in priority claims to be considered during a bankruptcy proceeding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
